value.title: How to Create Beautiful Power BI Dashboards 📊 Using the Power Pattern⚡
value.excerpt: In this video I show you how can create effective & beautiful Power BI Dashboards, using our unique Power Pattern! To learn more or to get additional help with your Power BI Dashboard, please visit https://www.LearnPowerBI.com/makeover  Power Pattern is a battle-tested approach based on the best principles

value.title: Using the SELECTEDVALUE function in DAX

value.title: Advanced Concatenate/ Merge columns with Power Query

topItems.title: How to Use CALCULATE in Power BI
topItems.excerpt: This is one of the most import function to master in Power BI. You can filter your data and create complex measure such as year over year comparisons with ease with these easy to follow tutorial. More more help this function.

topItems.title: Expand lists in Power BI (also a look at M Syntax)

Go here for the sample DAX statement: https://guyinacube.com/2017/06/tooltips-tooltips-tooltips-power-bi/

value.title: Using Power BI gateways to connect to data sources
value.excerpt: Learn all about the On-Premises Data Gateway and how it is used with the Power BI service. The Power BI gateway can be used to refresh imported data as well as allow you to use DirectQuery or connect live to an Analysis Services mode.

topItems.title: Get started with the Power BI Gateway
topItems.excerpt: Get to know what the Power BI Gateway is along with how to get it setup for scheduled refresh of imported data.  Free Gateway Cube Sheet: https://guyinacu.be/gatewaystartpdf  Gateway Documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/service-gateway-onprem  Gateway sizing: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/guidance/gateway-onprem-sizing

images.title: Get started with the Power BI Gateway

topItems.title: What the HECK is a Power BI Gateway Cluster?
topItems.excerpt: Confused about what a Power BI Gateway cluster is? Have your On-Premises Data Gateway installed but it's overloaded? This video is for you!  Documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/data-integration/gateway/service-gateway-high-availability-clusters  PowerShell: https://docs.microsoft.com/data-integration/gateway/service-gateway-powershell-support

value.title: Building relationships between tables when both have duplicates
value.excerpt: PowerPivot and Power BI Desktop only allow the creation of relationships between tables when one of columns forming the relationship does not have duplicate values.  In order to relate these two tables to one another, what we need is a third table with all distinct values from both tables. In this tutorial

value.title: Power BI Reports and Buttons (new with Power BI Desktop - April 2018)
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick looks at Power BI reports and buttons. Buttons were added to Power BI Desktop in the April 2018 release. You can now add buttons to your Power BI reports and configure actions for when they are selected.  Bookmarks and selections are a powerful combination with Power BI reports

value.title: Power BI Tutorial: Dynamically Filter By Today's Date
value.excerpt: In this Power BI Tutorial, Patrick looks at how to dynamically filter by today's date. Using a date table, you can create a DAX measure that can then be used as a Power BI report-level filter to dynamically filter by today's date within Power BI Desktop.be  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com

value.title: Is Power BI Certification Worth It? 💲💲💲 (Exam DA-100 / Exam 70-778 / Certified Data Analyst…)
value.excerpt: You may be considering taking the Microsoft Power BI Certification Exams…but should you? But before you put in the time, effort and money $$$...shouldn't you ask yourself "Is Power BI Certification Even Worth It?"  I am going to tell you 3 reasons you should and 3 reasons you shouldn't take these exams.
